subject: Boxing
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: A judge in Las Vegas gave the unbeaten boxing champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. until June 1 to turn himself in to serve a 90-day jail sentence for his guilty plea in a domestic violence case.
snippet: A judge in Las Vegas gave the unbeaten boxing champion Floyd Mayweather Jr. until June 1 to turn himself in to serve a 90-day jail sentence for his guilty plea in a domestic violence case.
